name: Don't Leaf Me
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare game jam 46. All art and music were created within this period.

Controls: A and D to move, space to jump. For best results enable full screen.

This is a platformer about a plant who was left behind by his family and needs to find water. His vision is fading, but you can help him.

Music was created using Beepbox. Art was created with Aseprite. Game was created in Unity.
